thread.title: Mindless EU savings rules cause panic, lost interest and hassle
thread.title_full: Mindless EU savings rules cause panic, lost interest and hassle

author: Richard Evans
title: Mindless EU savings rules cause panic, lost interest and hassle
text: Bank accounts Mindless EU savings rules cause panic, lost interest and hassle Comment: cutting the protection limit from £85,000 is idiotic – it puts bureaucratic nitpicking before the needs of savers Anyone with more than £75,000 with one bank will have to move some of their money before January 1 if they want it to remain fully protected Photo: Bloomberg News
